name: Tea Time At Night
description:
The game was made for the https://itch.io/jam/trijam-156 gamejam in 3 hours.
The theme was "Tea time".

The recipe is 2g of powder with 80°C water, mix it all with the bamboo brush and voila !

If you failed somewhere you can click on the cup to throw its content away or press R to restart the level .
